meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>sky</kanji> has an air of <kanji>neglect</kanji> about it and makes it seems like everything you're doing is in <vocabulary>vain</vocabulary>. Why even bother? The sky doesn't even believe in you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
